what.body: ethVM is a block explorer made by people that put user experience first. We made EthVM so that normal users can monitor blockchain transactions, view portfolio analytics, and even explore NFT collections without feeling like they are doing their taxes…or even worse:using Excel. It is an open source platform that empowers users to do more when it comes to crypto!

who.body: ethVM is made by the MyEtherWallet team!
who.body2: MEW was the first wallet interface in Ethereum and was founded 2 weeks after Ethereum mainnet went live. You can basically call us a crypto OG. Ever since our founding, our mission has been to make products that people love to use.

why.body: We made ethVM so that users, developers, and communities have a beautiful choice when it comes to block explorers. ethVM is open source, which makes it adaptable to any crypto ecosystem. So whether you want a better way to track your contract approvals or a solution for an ambitious new project - this is for you!

portfolio.limit: You can only store 10 addresses in your portfolio

tagline.addressName: Add custom names to addresses in order to easily track them through ethVM

footer.free: Help us keep ethVM free and open-source, your donations go a long way towards making that possible.
